publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive’s transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network.

S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business-That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive's transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network.
S1M-1181 Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business (lodged on 14 September 2000) David Mundell*, Alex Fergusson*
S1M-1181 Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business (lodged on 14 September 2000) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive’s transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network. Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr David Davidson
S1M-1181 Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business (lodged on 14 September 2000) David McLetchie*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive’s transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network. Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith

S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive’s transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network. Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith

S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive’s transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network. Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-1181 Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business (lodged on 14 September 2000) Mary Scanlon*

S1M-1181 Nick Johnston: Transport Policy Adding Costs to Business—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive’s transport policy is adding excessive costs to businesses, is failing to move heavy loads on to rail and is causing major damage to the road network. Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon
